posts.author: Duplicate bentoylight
posts.post_text: May 23, 2015 at 11:52 PM#5Select your dimmers:macro ON:1 Unpark selection2 at full                          0.1  (wait time)3 park selection               0.14 clearallmacro OFF1 unpark selection        0.12 at 0                          0.13 park selection4 clearallBut you should not use dimmers as power supply for moving head. Electronic system and ballast won't appreciate that !
